extendedInfo.description: USA/Canada only!Mobile Fax turns your phone into a fax machine!  Use the camera to scan a page and the phone will send it to a fax machine!Free version limited to one (single-page) fax per day with no coverpage.Premium and account versions available with more included faxes.In association with GotFreeFax.com.

reviews.title: HTC EVO
reviews.comment: Great app. U have to turn your cam to grayscale  and whiten edges, set for brightest . Once I did that pic was great. Won\'t work unless u put your name and email in..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Junk!
reviews.comment: Receiver couldn\'t read, image they received was literally the size of a thumbnail image on regular sized paper. Half of image was sold black though showed as clear in the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work!
reviews.comment: Can\'t see document before taking picture. Quality very poor, not legible. Tried several times without sucuss.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does work , needs plenty.of overhead lighting, a flash option woukd be perfect! Saced my butt on mire than one occasion, on Galaxy SII\tExcelent , needs good llighting  peps. Will work, trust me, abd yes u can view doc , before u send.
reviews.author: william macias

reviews.title: Image
reviews.comment: The image in the camera was distorted, possibly because this is a free version. The fax did not go through. My Efax account worked with my browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t even bother
reviews.comment: Under any light or position the\"scan\" is completely dark and you can\'t even read what your faxing, no matter what you do. When it scans it does not use the flash on my camera. You also can\'t attach from your photo gallery. Save your time don\'t bother with this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Picture looks like it came out okay but I could never get it to send. It says it sent, but it didn\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Illegible. Cant see image in camera view, hence blind photography makes it hard to scan!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pages come out dark regardless of how clear the picture is. They just scan like garbage
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap..
reviews.comment: U can only FAX one page and no cover letter .... what\'s the point!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No reviews given!
\"Delivery failure\" when testing and have to wait 24 hours or pay before I can try again? - Uninstalled!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could be a great app,if quality of FAX worked.fix and will definitely buy full version.mytouch 3g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EVO 4G n Happy.
reviews.comment: I sometimes have to do retakes..  but hey..  its from a \"cell\" n gets my papers faxed as needed.  It saves a lot of my time.  I use this app weekly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works with Moto Photon
reviews.comment: Free Free version has worked well for me on Samsung Epic.  Just upgraded to Photon and works fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: black and white faxed images don\'t come through very well , and it cost money to send them . get their scan2pdf instead, it works great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fair
reviews.comment: The fax went through but it was too dark, if you could upload a file instead of scanning, then the problem would much likely be solved. But for a free service its enough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more features.
reviews.comment: This app could be brilliant if you could fax *pdfs* and jpeg files already on your phone or in your email.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Even lighting for scan
reviews.comment: Awesome app I was able to send my fax for free
reviews.author: Mark Donat

reviews.title: Piece of CRAP!
reviews.comment: This app sucks and the service sucks! You can\'t send existing documents already on your phone and the camera interface gives you a screen full of vertical lines until you hit the capture button. Once you send, you have wait for an email with a webpage link to follow before it will actually send the FAX. Then the service wasn\'t compatible with my FAX machine/MFP. The FAX failed twice before giving up and sending another email saying \"Delivery Failed - No FAX machine detected on the receiving end\"
reviews.author: A Google User
